article.title: DARPA Awards Data Privacy Contract
article.text: SRI International, Menlo Park, California, is being awarded an $8,520,257 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to provide research and development services for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency. Support includes innovative research proposals in the areas of data privacy and privacy science to provide tools to capture, test and evaluate technologies. Work will be performed in Menlo Park, California, and is expected to be completed Feb. 16, 2020. Fiscal 2015 research, development, test and evaluation funds in the amount of $959,000 will be obligated at the time of award. Contract funds will not expire at the end of the current fiscal year. This contract was competitively procured via the Federal Business Opportunities website, with 89 proposals received. The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Pacific, San Diego, California, is the contracting activity (N66001-15-C-4071).
